notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Scandinavians bought or sold real estate in Chicago recently:
Claus L. Sandberg to Amanda Lind: Fairfield and Schubert Avenues. Price, $2,800.
Theodore Lind to Claus L. Sandberg: California and Diversey Avenues. Price, $7,000.
John A. Lindgren to State Bank of Chicago: Humboldt Boulevard and Maplewood Avenue. Price, $1.
Charles M. Anderson to Charles Heiden: Monticello Avenue and Augusta Street. Price, $6,000.
Ben Carlson to Gustav Carlson: Ridgeway and Potomac Avenues. Price, $1.
Fred Reichert to Hans B. Hansen: Augusta and Willow Streets. Price, $800.
H. T. Glover to Christ Serum. North 51st Avenue and Iowa Street. Price, $1,500.
Emmanuel Hogensen to Sara Reedy: Cortez Street and Pine Avenue. Price, $3,700.
C. C. Andersen to Frank C. Andersen: 602 North May Street. Price, $2,500.
Christian Falkenberg to Alex Follock: Michigan Avenue and 105th Street. Price, $1,500.
Harry Mayer to Alfred N. Jacobsen. Jacobsen: May and 77th Streets. Price, $600.
Anna Lange to Margret Cronin: Granville and Winchester Avenues. Price, $1,400.
Bertha M. Jacobsen to August Larsen: Summerdale and Winchester Avenues. Price, $5,000.
Charles Olsen to Hans J. Clausen: Armitage and 55th Avenues. Price, $9,000.
Paul F. Wagner to Peter C. Christensen: North 40th Court and Cortland Street. Price, $3,000.
Ernest Berg to Ernest Mayer: 44th Court and Cortland Street. Price, $2,500.
Paul M. Pedersen to Martin S. Serum: Fullerton and Spaulding Avenues. Price, $1,250.
Henry S. Aulie to Lauritz Petersen: Springfield Avenue and George Street. Price, $2,400.
John Clausen to John C. Klein: Mohawk Street and Rees Avenue. Price, $2,000.
